name: Gardevoir & Sylveon GX
author: Atsuko Nishida

attacks.name: Fairy Song
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 {Y} Energy cards and attach them to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Kaleidostorm
attacks.effect: Move any number of Energy from your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Magical Miracle GX
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {Y} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
